data.eml:eml: A new widespread European bee species of the genus Dasypoda Latreille (Hymenoptera, Apoidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Radchenko, Vladimir G. (2016): A new widespread European bee species of the genus Dasypoda Latreille (Hymenoptera, Apoidea). Zootaxa 4184 (3): 491-504, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4184.3.4
